name: Flappy Ball 2020
description:
The best soccer fun game!
Try to juggle the ball through the obstacles!

How to play:
- Tap, tap, tap and avoid the obstacles

Features:
- 4 game modes
- Unlock different balls
- Music: Anthems of the best 24 European national teams
- Obstacles: Choose obstacle colors of 24 European soccer teams
- Play via Game Center with your friends
